info.title: API-American-Football
info.description: American Football data API providing comprehensive information about leagues, teams, players, games, and more. This API covers American Football leagues with detailed season information, game data, and comprehensive coverage details.

get.description: Retrieve American Football leagues/cups based on various filters

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Team ID to find leagues where the team has played

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search text for league name or country

parameters.name: current
parameters.description: Filter leagues where the season is currently in progress

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Number of last leagues/cups added to the API

errors: You are not subscribed to this API.

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Retrieve American Football games based on various filters. Supports single/multiple game IDs, live games, date ranges, league/team filtering, and venue-specific queries. Returns events, lineups, and statistics for specific game requests.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Multiple game IDs separated by hyphens (returns events, lineups, statistics)

parameters.name: live
parameters.description: Live games - use 'all' for all live games or league IDs separated by hyphens (returns events)

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Number of last fixtures to retrieve

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Number of next fixtures to retrieve

errors: You are not subscribed to this API.

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Get detailed statistics for a game

value.description: Statistic value (can be number or string like percentages)

get.description: Get all available events from a game including touchdowns, field goals, penalties, and other game events

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Team ID to filter events by team

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: Player ID to filter events by player

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Event type to filter by (Touchdown, Field Goal, Penalty, etc.)

detail.description: Event detail (e.g., Passing Touchdown, Field Goal Made, Personal Foul)

get.description: Get detailed statistics for a team in a specific league and season
Retrieve American Football players based on various filters
Retrieve American Football teams based on various filters
